text: What Price Glory? is a 1952 American World War I comedy movie. It was directed by John Ford. It is a remake of the 1926 movie of the same name. Actors include James Cagney, Corinne Calvet, Dan Dailey, Robert Wagner, Wally Vernon, and James Gleason. It was distributed by 20th Century Fox. ==Other websites== * Category:1952 comedy movies Category:1952 war movies Category:American comedy movies Category:World War I movies Category:Movie remakes Category:Movies directed by John Ford
title: What Price Glory? (1952 movie)
